message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even at this price point.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm not willing to pay $14,000. I'm willing to pay up to $11,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I'm eager to make a deal, $11,000 is below my bottom line.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
I understand your position, but $12,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $12,000. Can you consider my revised offer?
